title: Transformations
content: From 2 to 3 function transform(event) { event.displayName = event.firstName + " " + event.lastName } From 3 to 2 function transform(event) { // just a dummy downcast transformation } From 1 to 2 function transform(event) { event.salutation = "NA" }

added displayName (mandatory) -> will be set to firstName + lastName  Schema { "additionalProperties" : true, "properties" : { "firstName" : { "type": "string" }, "lastName" : { "type": "string" }, "salutation": { "type": "string", "enum": ["Mr", "Mrs", "NA"] }, "displayName": { "type": "string" } }, "required": ["firstName", "lastName", "salutation", "displayName"] } Examples simple.json { "firstName" : "Horst", "lastName": "Lichter", "salutation": "Mr", "displayName": "Horst Lichter" }

added salutation (mandatory)  Schema { "additionalProperties" : true, "properties" : { "firstName" : { "type": "string" }, "lastName" : { "type": "string" }, "salutation": { "type": "string", "enum": ["Mr", "Mrs", "NA"] } }, "required": ["firstName", "lastName", "salutation"] } Examples simple.json { "firstName" : "Horst", "lastName": "Lichter", "salutation": "Mr" }

initial version of UserCreated  Schema { "additionalProperties" : true, "properties" : { "firstName" : { "type": "string" }, "lastName" : { "type": "string" } }, "required": ["firstName", "lastName"] } Examples simple.json { "firstName" : "Horst", "lastName": "Lichter" }

title: Home
content: My Company Schema Registry This site represents our latest events, transformations and documentation.

title: UserCreated
content:
Describes a user creation event.
Latest version (3) Schema { "additionalProperties" : true, "properties" : { "firstName" : { "type": "string" }, "lastName" : { "type": "string" }, "salutation": { "type": "string", "enum": ["Mr", "Mrs", "NA"] }, "displayName": { "type": "string" } }, "required": ["firstName", "lastName", "salutation", "displayName"] } Examples simple.json { "firstName" : "Horst", "lastName": "Lichter", "salutation": "Mr", "displayName": "Horst Lichter" } Changelog Version 3  added displayName (mandatory) -> will be set to firstName + lastName  Version 2  added salutation (mandatory)  Version 1  initial version of UserCreated

title: users
content: This namespace contains all user related events.
